message.0: The Industrious Member Portal gives you instant access to everything you need to manage your workday. Create your account and begin booking meeting rooms, managing your upcoming reservations, and more.
message.1: Tell us a bit more about yourself to help us create a better workday experience for our community. Any and all information you provide us will always be kept confidential, private, and secure.
message.4: Update your profile information to easily find and connect with other members in the Industrious community.
message.8: Complete your company profile to allow members of the Industrious community to easily find and connect with your business.

section1.title: Member + Community Guidelines
section1.answer: Please refer to the Member Handbook (
section1.answer2: ) for a full overview of how to use our spaces. For quick reference, below are some of the most frequently asked questions.

section2.title: Accessing the office
section2.body: You’ll be able to enter your Industrious home location 24/7 with either a member keycard (a hard keycard given to you during your onboarding) or a Salto PIN (a unique pin code just for you, that you’ll use to get in our front doors).
section2.body2: At most locations, our main doors remain unlocked during business hours, however, you may need your keycard or Salto PIN for access at the building level. Some locations do have certain floors or areas with doors that remain locked for security purposes, so we do recommend keeping your keycard with you at all times.
section2.question: Will I be able to get into other Industrious locations 24/7?
section2.answer: No, as of now your keycard or PIN is specific to your home location. When visiting another office, please ensure that you have booked an Open Workspace, Office, Meeting Room, or Desk via the Member Portal and are arriving within standard business hours (8am - 5pm local time)

section3.title: IT

question1.question: What type of internet is provided by Industrious?
question1.answer: Memberships include standard fiber internet, which is a shared 300 Mbps for uploads and downloads. Dedicated bandwidth is available at an additional cost.

question2.question: What if I need a Public IP?
question2.answer: We can offer static public IP addresses at an additional monthly cost - once provisioned, these can be configured for use on member equipment such as firewalls.

question3.question: Why does my wifi seem slow?
question3.answer: Please ensure that you are connected to the Wifi Secure network with your personal credentials. If you need your password to be reset, kindly contact your Community Team. If you are already on Wifi Secure and still experiencing issues, please run a
question3.answer2: and email a screenshot of the results to your Community Team, who can help troubleshoot with our provider.

question4.question: What wifi is available for my guests/visitors?
question4.answer: We offer a complimentary Guest Wifi network for anyone visiting the space. To connect, the visitor will simply need to fill out the splash page with their name and email address. Please note that the Guest Wifi network will time out after 4 hours; your guest can simply sign back on at that point!

section3.learnMoreText: For any other questions, please connect directly with your local Community Team.

question1.question: Is any food and beverage included with my membership?:
question1.answer: Yes, your membership includes daily breakfast, snacks, and a weekly happy hour. Our cafes additionally feature bottomless coffee and tea, as well as unlimited soft drinks.

question2.question: What if I have dietary restrictions/allergies?:
question2.answer: Please let your Community Team know about any restrictions or allergies and they will do their best to accommodate you when possible.

question3.question: Is there a community fridge where I can keep personal items?:
question3.answer: Yes! Your Community Team can direct you to the fridge and show you how to label your items. Each team does a weekly fridge clean out on a specific date, so please ensure that you are removing your items on a regular basis.

question4.question: I’m a nursing mother; is there a place where I can pump and/or store expressed milk?:
question4.answer: Absolutely. Each location has a Wellness Room, which is a private space that can be reserved when you need to pump. The room features comfortable seating as well as a small refrigerator (some additionally have sinks). When you need to use the room, please reserve via the Member Portal - it will not utilize your conference room hours, however, this ensures that all members who need the space can find a time. Please be certain to label your milk and remove it from the fridge at the end of the day.

question5.question: What is a Wellness Room?:
question5.answer: The Wellness Room is a restful space designed for members or guests requiring medical privacy such as nursing mothers, but it is available to all members who require privacy for medical purposes, prayer, or other reasons. Please see your Community Team for more details.

question6.question: What is a Focus Room?:
question6.answer: Focus Rooms are small, comfortable spaces that provide privacy for members when they need it. Rooms are available on a first come, first serve basis, but we do ask that you keep your time to no more than one hour out of consideration for the community. Please see your Community Team if you aren’t sure where the Focus Rooms are located.

question7.question: What is a Phone Room/Booth?:
question7.answer: Phone Rooms/Booths are first come, first serve spaces that offer members a private area to take a call. Kindly limit your time in the room to one hour or less per visit in order to ensure that all members have an opportunity to utilize the space.

section5.title: Billing and Invoices

question1.question: When is my office invoice due?:
question1.answer: Office invoices are sent out on the 10th day of the preceding month. All invoices for recurring charges (i.e. office fees, monthly parking, etc) are due on the 1st day of each month.

question2.question: Are there late fees?:
question2.answer: Yes, a 10% late fee will apply to any balance more than 5 days past due.

question3.question: How can I view my invoices?:
question3.answer2: . If you do not have a portal log-in, please contact your local Community Team.

question4.question: What payment methods do you accept?
question4.answer: For your convenience, our billing portal supports ACH and credit card payments, and your primary payment method will be set to autopay when onboarding. We also accept wire transfers and checks, but please note there is a $45 monthly manual payment processing fee for those who opt out of autopay.
question4.answer2: Please send checks to the lockbox address listed on your invoice, and include your account number and a copy of the invoice.
question4.answer3: Checks submitted to the office location may be subject to significant processing delays and be eligible for late fees.
question4.answer4: If processing ACH or wire transfer, please contact your local Community Team to receive the correct W9 and/or Bank Letter. Each location operates as an individual entity, so if your company has multiple locations, you will need to request the W9 and Bank Letter for each office.

question5.question: I need to update the invoice (name, address, PO number, etc):
question5.answer: Please contact your local Community Team and they will be more than happy to assist with any changes to the account.

section5.learnMoreText: More questions? Please refer to our

question1.question: Can I visit another Industrious location?:
question1.answer: Absolutely! All Access and office members are able to work out of other locations. To visit another location, please log into the Member Portal and book an Open Workspace, Office, Meeting Room, or Desk at the location of your choice. This ensures that the local Community Team is ready to welcome you! Please note that you must arrive during business hours (8am - 5pm local time) and we cannot provide visitor access during any of the days/times listed on our

question2.question: Do you have international offices?:
question2.answer: Yes, we do. Please refer to
question2.answer2: to find a full list of locations. If you would like to visit an international office, please email your Community Team so that they can assist with the details.

question3.question: Can I use meeting rooms at another Industrious location?
question3.answer: Yes, you may utilize your meeting room hours to book rooms at any Industrious location via our member portal.

question4.question: How do I find an Industrious in a city that I’m visiting?
question4.answer: has a full list of our locations.

question1.question: What furniture is included with my office?:
question1.answer: We provide a set number of custom desks, chairs, and trash bins for each office. With advance notice, furniture can be removed as well. Please connect with your local Community Team to discuss options and necessary lead times.

question2.question: What if my office is too cold/hot?:
question2.answer: Office temperatures are typically moderated by zones and kept within a building-specific range that is comfortable for multiple members. Your Community Team can provide additional information about your location.

question3.question: Can I decorate my office?:
question3.answer: Absolutely! We encourage members to make the space comfortable and often see teams add area rugs, plants, and other decor. In order to avoid obstructing natural light or line of sight, please avoid affixing anything to the glass walls or windows. If you have any large pieces of furniture that you would like to place in front of the glass, please speak to your Community Team so that they can evaluate the potential impact to other members in the space. Any damage to the office will be deducted from your Security Deposit return when you move out of the space. If you have further questions about office decorations or furnishings, please contact your Community Team directly.

question4.question: Can I put up privacy film?:
question4.answer: Privacy film is evaluated on a case-by-case basis. Please speak directly to your Community Team to learn more.

question5.question: Can I put my logo onto the office door?:
question5.answer: We are happy to arrange for installation. Please speak to your Community Team in order to discuss sizing and next steps.

question6.question: How often is my office cleaned?:
question6.answer: Industrious manages cleaning for all common areas on a regular basis and limited services within member offices. Trash cans are emptied on a nightly basis. For any urgent janitorial needs (large spill, broken glass, etc), please notify your Community Team.

section8.title: What are my options to reserve a workspace?

question1.question: Meeting Rooms
question1.answer: can be reserved using hours. At your home location, reservations can be made for any time of the day. If you are visiting another Industrious location, you may reserve a meeting room during business hours, between 8:30am and 5:00pm, Monday to Friday.

question2.question: Open Workspace
question2.answer: reservations are unlimited for our Access and office members. An open workspace is a place to sit in the common spaces at any Industrious location, and reservations last all day during business hours.
question2.accessMembersDescription: are required to make an open workspace reservation when working at their home location, or other locations in the network (if their membership includes the global network).
question2.dedicatedOfficeMemberDescription: only need to make an open workspace reservation if they are visiting other locations outside of their home location, and are not required to reserve at their home location.
question2.virtualMembershipsDescription: do not include access to reserve open workspaces.

question3.question: Offices
question3.answer: can be reserved on a daily basis and are priced based on location, size, and amenities. On average, pricing across our network is around $50/seat/day for these reservable offices.

question4.question: Desks
question4.answer: can be reserved by companies who have configured hotdesking - please speak with your Member Experience Manager to enable this functionality.

section9.title: How can I invite guests to Industrious locations?
section9.body: If you are planning to have guests at any Industrious location, please notify the local Member Experience Manager at least a day in advance, sharing a list of your guests and their date of arrival. You can find the local Manager’s contact information in your reservation confirmation emails. Click here to view details about our Guest Policy in the

section10.title: How far in advance can I reserve?
section10.body: Meeting Rooms, Open Workspaces and Offices can be reserved up to 90 days in advance.

section11.title: What is the cancellation period for my reservations?

question1.question: Meeting room
question1.answer: reservations can be modified or canceled up to 30 minutes prior to the start time of the reservation. Any cancellations made after that time will result in a hours deduction from your balance, or if you’ve used your available meeting room hours for the month, you’ll see a corresponding overage fee.

question2.question: Open workspace
question2.answer: reservations can be canceled up to 15 hours before the start of the reservation.

question3.question: Office
question3.answer: reservations must be canceled before 5pm on the day before the reservation to avoid a charge. Any cancellations made past 5pm will result in a day pass being deducted from your balance.

section12.title: How can I make additional reservations that exceed my regular monthly allotment of day passes and/or meeting room hours?
section12.body: You can proceed to make the reservation and the portal will alert you if your reservation will incur an overage. You can view your monthly balance any time by clicking on the "View all my reservations" link under the Upcoming Reservations drawer on the portal. You will be billed for your overages at the end of the month.

section13.title: If I have incurred day pass or meeting room hour overages, where can I see this balance?
section13.body: In the Upcoming Reservations side pop-out menu on any reservation page, click the “View all my reservations” link to view your monthly allotted and used balance.

section14.title: Where can I view my remaining monthly balance for day passes and meeting room hours?
section14.body: Your monthly day pass and meeting room hours balance will be displayed on each respective reservation creation page.

section15.title: Do purchased meeting room hours roll over? How do they work with the regular allotment of hours I receive every month?
section15.body: When you reserve a meeting room, hours are first deducted from the regular hours you receive every month until they are exhausted. You will be billed for overages at the end of each month for all conference room time reserved beyond your allotted hours.

section16.title: Where can I edit my notification preferences?
section16.body: You can set your email and SMS notification preferences on the
section16.body2: page, which can be found under the Account menu by clicking on your name in the top right corner of the Member Portal.

section17.title: What is the new Reserve an Office feature?
section17.body: This is a feature improvement that allows you to book an office for yourself or your team for the day.
section17.answer2: Select an office for the day that fits your needs: the right size, natural light, and amenities you need.
section17.answer3: See where your teammates are booking, so you can sit alongside them.

section18.title: What are all the different types of workspace that I, as a member, can reserve in the portal?
section18.body: Members can reserve the following types of workspaces within the member portal:
section18.answer1: A meeting room, in 30 min increments up to a full day.
section18.answer2: A private office for themselves or their team, by the day.
section18.answer3: An open workspace seat in our community cafes and lounges, by the day
section18.answer4: (If enabled for your company) A desk within your company’s dedicated office, by the day.
section18.learnMore2: , and contact your Member Experience Manager to find out how you can utilize this feature with your team.

section19.title: Who can reserve an Office?
section19.body: Offices can be reserved by any Access, dedicated office, or dedicated suite member. This feature is not available to our Virtual members – if you’d like to upgrade to be able to book workspace by the day, please discuss with your Member Experience Manager.

section20.title: Do members pay to reserve an Office?
section20.body: Yes, our offices available by the day have rates that vary with Industrious location and office factors (size, window, etc). On average, across our network, these offices tend to be about $50/seat/day. You can select the office that works best for you price-wise via the member portal.
section20.body2: If you have day passes associated with your account, you’ll use those first (1 day pass per office, regardless of size). Once your day passes have all been used for the month, you’ll see the dollar price associated with offices.

section21.title: How can I see where my teammate has reserved an Office?
section21.body: When making an Office reservation, you’ll see a small tag next to the already reserved office(s) that says “Teammate”, along with that teammate’s first name and last initial. Assuming there’s room, you’re welcome to just hop over and sit in that office with your teammate!

section22.title: Can a non-member book an office for the day?
section22.body: No, this booking feature is available to members only.

section23.title: Can I have guests work out of my reserved office?
section23.body: Yes. Just like when you’re reserving a meeting room, you can invite guests to work out of your office. Once you’ve reserved an office, you’ll see a button that allows you to “Register Attendees.” This will open a pre-populated email for you to share your guests’ names, and send the message to our local staff at that location. Please make sure to do this step, so we can ensure your guests get smoothly through building security.

section24.title: What is the new hotdesking feature?
section24.body: For our dedicated office members, you’ll now have the ability for your employees to book desks within your office via the Industrious member portal. This can be helpful if:
section24.answer1: You have employees in a hotdesking situation, where folks are rotating through usage of your office.
section24.answer2: You’d just like more visibility into how your employees are using the office
section24.answer3: This feature will need to be enabled for your team by your Member Experience Manager. Please discuss with them, and once enabled, your employees will see the option to “Reserve a Desk within your Office” in the portal.

section25.title: Do my employees pay to reserve a Desk within our office?
section25.body: No, your employees will not pay when reserving desks within your dedicated office. Keep in mind that employees regularly using the office should have a membership through Industrious. Your Member Experience Manager can work with you to issue additional memberships, and discuss any associated cost.

section26.title: How do my employees reserve a Desk?

section27.title: What if my office is maxed out for the day?
section27.body: Not a problem! You can book an additional office by the day in our member portal (see “Reserve a Private Office” feature) for the number of people you need. Alternatively, you can book a meeting room, if you’d prefer to have an AV-enabled room.

section28.title: How can a member invite a nonmember to reserve a Desk?
section28.body: If you have a guest joining you who’s not a member (e.g. they’re visiting from another city, or are a client looking to work alongside you for the day), we recommend having one of your employees book two desks in their own name. The guest can sit at one of those desks.

SubmitEmail.success: If the details you entered match our records, you should receive an email from us shortly.

meetingSummary.onDemandCancellation: This is an on-demand reservation. Canceling will trigger a 100% refund. Are you sure you want to cancel this reservation?
meetingSummary.cancellation: Are you sure you want to cancel this reservation?
